components.tpl: Set monthly target:

formulas.txt: replace((($KTtarget/count_days(date_startof(date((datevalue(switch($KTdatePicker,"Today",today(),"Yesterday",yesterday(),"This Week",date_startof(today(),"4"),"Last Week",date_startof(today(),"4","-1"),"This Month",date_startof(today(),"3"),"Last Month",date_startof(today(),"3","-1")),"yyyyMMdd")),"yyyyMMdd"),"3"),date_endof(date((datevalue(if(($KTperiod="Full"),(switch($KTdatePicker,"Today",today(),"Yesterday",yesterday(),"This Week",date_endof(today(),"4"),"Last Week",date_endof(today(),"4","-1"),"This Month",date_endof(today(),"3"),"Last Month",date_endof(today(),"3","-1"))),today()),"yyyyMMdd")),"yyyyMMdd"),"3")))*count_days(date((datevalue(switch($KTdatePicker,"Today",today(),"Yesterday",yesterday(),"This Week",date_startof(today(),"4"),"Last Week",date_startof(today(),"4","-1"),"This Month",date_startof(today(),"3"),"Last Month",date_startof(today(),"3","-1")),"yyyyMMdd")),"yyyyMMdd"),date((datevalue(if(($KTperiod="Full"),(switch($KTdatePicker,"Today",today(),"Yesterday",yesterday(),"This Week",date_endof(today(),"4"),"Last Week",date_endof(today(),"4","-1"),"This Month",date_endof(today(),"3"),"Last Month",date_endof(today(),"3","-1"))),today()),"yyyyMMdd")),"yyyyMMdd"))),"Infinity","")
